actions: Invigorates the Blood, dispels Blood Stasis, alleviates pain, reduces swelling, generates flesh and promotes healing.

Invigorates the Blood, promotes the movement of Qi, reduces swelling and generates flesh.

Tendency to hemorrhage dark blood or clots
